channel.title: Project 4 on Amul Vaibhav

item.title: Project I: WEB Scrapping
item.description: Scraped Movies/Series from the TMBD website using Requests& BeautifulSoup4 Built Functions such as get_topic_page(), Ratings(),movie_url() to scrape movies name, Ratings, URL of the website, Date of Release etc. Stored data consisting of 100+ rows x 5 columns and into Movies.csv Link to GitHub Repository
